level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2 [ยง 2-501 et seq.], shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this part. The proposed rules shall be submitted to the Council for a 45-day period of review, excluding Saturdays, Sundays, legal holidays, and days of Council recess. If the Council does not approve or disapprove the proposed rules, in whole or in part, by resolution within this 45-day review period, the proposed rules shall be deemed approved.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-218
level.text: For Law 18-218, see notes following ยง 1-325.161.
